statements: SELECT * FROM Forecasting_Demand;
SELECT demand_id, product_name, demand_date FROM Forecasting_Demand;
SELECT product_name, demand_quantity FROM Forecasting_Demand WHERE demand_quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM Forecasting_Demand ORDER BY demand_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, demand_date, demand_quantity FROM Forecasting_Demand WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' ORDER BY demand_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, demand_date, demand_quantity FROM Forecasting_Demand WHERE demand_quantity > 100 ORDER BY demand_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Forecasting_Demand WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY demand_quantity ASC, demand_date DESC;
SELECT demand_id, product_name, demand_quantity FROM Forecasting_Demand WHERE demand_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY product_name ASC, demand_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(demand_quantity) AS total_demand FROM Forecasting_Demand GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_demand > 500 ORDER BY total_demand DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records, AVG(demand_quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM Forecasting_Demand WHERE demand_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM DemandForecast WHERE forecast_id = 'DF100'
SELECT forecast_date, forecast_value FROM DemandForecast WHERE forecast_date < '2023-01-01'
SELECT schedule_id, schedule_date FROM ProcurementSchedule ORDER BY schedule_date ASC
SELECT product_id, supplier_id, quantity FROM ProcurementSchedule WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT schedule_id, product_id, supplier_id, schedule_date FROM ProcurementSchedule WHERE supplier_id = 'Supplier1'
SELECT * FROM DemandForecast WHERE forecast_value > 100 ORDER BY forecast_date DESC
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_date FROM DemandForecast WHERE forecast_value BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY forecast_value ASC
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_date, forecast_value FROM DemandForecast WHERE forecast_date <= '2022-06-30' AND forecast_value < 50
SELECT MAX(forecast_value) AS max_forecast_value FROM DemandForecast
SELECT schedule_date, product_id, quantity FROM ProcurementSchedule WHERE supplier_id LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY schedule_date
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, quantity_sold, revenue FROM products JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM products p JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id WHERE i.restock_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_sold FROM products p JOIN sales s ON p.product_id = s.product_id GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_sold DESC;
SELECT product_name, revenue, stock_quantity FROM products p JOIN sales s ON p.product_id = s.product_id JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id WHERE revenue > 1000 AND stock_quantity < 50;
SELECT * FROM product;
SELECT id, name, price FROM product WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT product_id, date, forecasted_quantity FROM demand_forecast ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, status FROM procurement_schedule WHERE procurement_quantity > 100;
SELECT date, quantity_sold, revenue FROM sales WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecasted_quantity > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_id, SUM(forecasted_quantity) AS total_forecast FROM demand_forecast GROUP BY product_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT sales.date, sales.quantity_sold, product.name FROM sales JOIN product ON sales.product_id = product.id WHERE sales.quantity_sold > 50 ORDER BY sales.date ASC;

SELECT product.name, product.category, SUM(sales.quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold FROM product JOIN sales ON product.id = sales.product_id GROUP BY product.name, product.category HAVING total_quantity_sold > 500;

SELECT p.name AS product_name, SUM(ps.procurement_quantity) AS total_procurement FROM procurement_schedule ps JOIN product p ON ps.product_id = p.id WHERE ps.status = 'Approved' GROUP BY p.name ORDER BY total_procurement DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast;
SELECT id, product_name, forecast_quantity FROM sales_data ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, procurement_quantity FROM procurement_schedule WHERE procurement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT forecast_date, forecast_quantity FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecast_quantity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM demand_analysis WHERE demand_impact < 0 ORDER BY demand_impact ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, forecast_quantity, forecast_date FROM demand_forecast ORDER BY forecast_quantity DESC, forecast_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sales_quantity > 1000 ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(procurement_quantity) AS total_procurement FROM procurement_schedule GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_procurement > 500 ORDER BY total_procurement DESC;
SELECT da.demand_category, pa.procurement_category, da.demand_trend, pa.procurement_trend FROM demand_analysis da INNER JOIN procurement_analysis pa ON da.demand_category = pa.procurement_category;
SELECT id, product_name, forecast_quantity, forecast_date FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecast_quantity > 500 AND forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
